description: Saint John the Baptist in the Wilderness in a loin cloth reclining on red drapery under a tree by a stream with his hands clasped with the lamb and the cross by his side. in the clouds above are seven infant Angels' heads
text: Saint John the Baptist is described in the gospels as the "voice of one crying in the wilderness” because of his continuous preaching while he roamed the desert clothed in a tunic of camel’s hair and living off a simple diet of locusts and honey.
title: Saint John the Baptist
